latex:
Let $ f(x)$ be a function with the two properties:\\

\begin{enumerate}
\item for any two real numbers $ x$ and $ y$, $ f(x + y) = x + f(y)$, and
\item $ f(0) = 2$
\end{enumerate}
What is the value of $ f(1998)$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 0\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 2\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 1996\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 1998\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 2000$
